MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow is still ongoing. This is due to excavation difficulties onsite and we now expect power to be back on by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.33pm on Monday 25th January 2021.
